transcript_chunks.text: the corner store owner like eating Snickers by the Box 100% every time at the time when I worked at the gas station I'd just eat all the candy there and I didn't tell nobody sounds awesome that sounds great I believe I would take one bite out of a stickers bar put it down and go grab some lemon drops I go down I never heard a Weise hit that frequency before sounds awesome that sounds great my left ear started A tingle that
